attributes.action: A State Pension SHOULD NOT BE TAXED!
attributes.additional_details: A State Pension should not be added to any working income, £111 state pension, you can only earn £89, after that you pay tax on it. How can a pensioner that maybe partly deformed due to age manage on £200 per week when those that have never worked can be given higher payments because the state says they need a set amount to survive. sign this petition to allow us a state pension that's not added to your 'little job'.
